channel.title: Adding projectiles

item.title: Adding projectiles
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

Hello.

I just needs help with adding projectiles… I don’t know where to start, can anyone like edit this code for me, or tell me what to add to it to make it a projectile?

[code] public void sendStillGFX(int id, int x, int y) {
StaticPacketBuilder p1 = new StaticPacketBuilder().setId(85);
p1.addByteC(y - (player.getLocation().getRegionY() * 8));
p1.addByteC(x - (player.getLocation().getRegionX() * 8));
player.getIoSession().write(p1.toPacket());

	StaticPacketBuilder p2 = new StaticPacketBuilder().setId(4);
	p2.addByte((byte)0);
	p2.addShort(id);
	p2.addByte((byte)100);
	p2.addShort(0);
	player.getIoSession().write(p2.toPacket());
}[/code]

(This is stillGFX code, but it sends a GFX, so I just need it to move ;))

Thanks GREATLY in advance!
-Skullator
